dt-example.title: DataTables events
dt-example.info:
DataTables fires a number of custom events which you can bind to in the standard jQuery fashion, allowing your code to perform custom actions when these events occur.
This example shows the use of the `dt-event sort`, `dt-event filter` and `dt-event page` events by adding a notification that the event fired to an element on the page to show that they have indeed fired.
